meanings.sent1: She gridironed the burgers for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: My mom always gridironed the steaks perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The chef gridironed the vegetables with precision.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the meat gridironed on the hot grill.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the gridironed food filled the air.

meanings.definition: To mark with lines resembling a gridiron.
meanings.sent1: The artist gridironed the canvas with bold strokes.
meanings.sent2: The field was gridironed with white lines for the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat gridironed the carpet with its claws.
meanings.sent4: The shadows gridironed the pavement in the evening light.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops gridironed the window, creating patterns.
